dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Wow~ We can just kill people left and right and get praised in this Office?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: It's been a while since I had breakfast without trembling in the cold~ I'm used to eating in the streets.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: My my~ I think I gave myself muscle cramps pulling so many people apart yesterday~ I should really stop getting swept up in other people's excitements.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I love these dark hours of the day. Not only is it good for my line of work, but it's also fun creeping people out in the shadows~ It's the most entertaining time of day, except during the Night in the Backstreets.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: What a nice guy our representative is, picking up people from killer Syndicates like ours. I never imagined that people like us would be working as Fixers!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: The Hook Office... Hm. I don't know how long I'll be working here. It's still got a long way to go... But you know how Offices can be. As easy as they are to start, it's just as easy for them to shut down without a warning.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: I don't think our Office name is very memorable. Even when I introduce myself, it rarely seems to ring a bell in people...?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Hm, hm. Don't talk softly like that. It's a little... irritating. Let's not make your death even more painful, hm?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: This bionic gear from that Workshop is really handy. Apparently it's easier to equip than others, too. And they move just like my very own limbs. Ripping, tearing, decorating... It's got a lot of uses~

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Mm~ Downtime again. Do they really have that little work to give us?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: I agree, I did good work~ Just bring me some more, and I'll show you what I'm really made of. You will, right?

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Do we have a contract?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: How much shall I rip and tear today?

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Ah, I wasn't supposed to hang them up like that?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Get over... here!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Hmm~ No point dragging on.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Uh oh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Let's get this over with, okay?

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Oh... they were... predicting my moves...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Hm, that was easy. I'm leavin' first!

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Give me something I'm good at. Not something like this.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: I didn't enjoy that. They couldn't hold out long enough for me.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Haah~ I think I'm finally starting to straighten out my life! I should keep saving up money and buy me some better gear.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: What...? Fixers aren't allowed to just kill people...? So they lied to me...
